article.title: Lockheed Martin Awarded $977 Million Facilities Development and Operations Contract From NASA
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Lockheed Martin has been awarded the Facilities Development and Operations Contract at the Johnson Space Center. The contract is worth up to $977 million if all options are exercised. Services will include the development, sustaining engineering, operations and maintenance of facilities supporting training, flight design, flight planning, reconfiguration and real-time operations for human space flight programs.
